sentence.Network_en: This horn had eyes like the eyes of a man and a mouth that spoke boastfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 这角有眼,像人的眼,有口说夸大的话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 翻译- '自夸' - bab.la词典 - 英语翻译: 自夸的人, 自夸的, 使自夸...  自夸 [zì kuā] (又作: 以有…而... 瞎自夸的 bumptious  自夸地 boastfully.

list.abs: 虚荣的欺骗自己 (cheat ourselves boastfully) 多么好的 (very good) 一个冠冕堂皇的理由(a high-sounding excuse) 让我曾经痴迷 (let me crazy) 萨特,告诉你.

auth_sentence.content: But Dick, smiling boastfully, boyishly, did not agree: Get the bubbles out of your blood.
